item.description:
Join us for a Public Relations workshop with Julia Tanen! Julia is the Managing Director of the KCSA Boston office. Tanen has been honored with awards from the Publicity Club of New England and is involved with a number of charitable organizations. Learn from a Public Relations expert and gain valuable PR knowledge!

http://www.kcsa.com/k...

"Personal PR to Build Your Brand and How to Leverage LinkedIn"
We will be covering the following areas:
- Definition of PR
- Tools of PR
- Creative Ideas for your PR Plan
- Developing your six month PR Program
- Aligning your social media program to your PR program

There will be a Q/A session after, along with some mingling and networking! See you there!
* Space is limited for this event so please make sure you can attend.

group.name: New England Network for Women :: Cambridge

item.name: Workshop: "Personal PR to Build Your Brand and How To Leverage LinkedIn"
